Trigger.name: Bloodlet

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+)'?s? daegger flits around (.+)'s stunned figure, stabbing repeatedly as small mouths along the blade feed on the blood\.$
^(\w+)'?s? daegger flies towards (.+) and attempts to stab into \w+ neck, but is only able to strike a glancing blow\.$
^(\w+)'?s? daegger stabs into (.+)'s neck, dozens of tiny mouths opening along the blade and sucking hungrily at the blood\.$
